articles.title: In Photos: A Full ‘Cold Moon’ Occults Mars On A Rare And Auspicious Night For Crewed Spaceflight - Forbes
articles.description: A full Moon blotted-out Mars at its biggest, brightest and best for up to an hour as seen from North America, Europe and North Africa on the 50th anniversary of the launch of Apollo 17, NASA’s final crewed mission to land humans on the lunar surface.
articles.content:
